name: Wolf of the Battlefield: COMMANDO
description:
Experience the Capcom arcade game that spawned a multitude of clones as the original Commando comes to your living room courtesy of the Virtual Console Arcade service. Take control of Super Joe and (eight-directionally) shoot your way upwards into the enemy's territory, using grenades to wreak havoc with enemy placements in this seminal genre creator.

This classic game is part of the Virtual Console service, which brings you great games created for consoles such as NES™, Super NES™ and Game Boy™ Advance. See more Virtual Console games for Wii.
